typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		adf as (prospect as ({@status} as string, customer as (agent as string, comments as (comment as string), contact as (address as ({@type} as string, apartment as string, city as string, country as string, postalcode as integer, regioncode as string, street as ({@line} as boolean)), email as string, name as ({@part} as string, {_value_} as string)[], phone as ({@type} as string, {_value_} as integer)[]), timeframe as (description as string, earliestdate as string, latestdate as string)), id as ({@sequence} as boolean, {@source} as string, {_value_} as string), provider as (name as ({@part} as string, {_value_} as string), service as string), requestdate as string, vehicle as ({@interest} as string, {@status} as string, make as string, model as string, stock as string, trim as string, vin as string, year as short), vendor as (agentname as string, contact as (vendorname as string), id as ({@sequence} as boolean, {@source} as string, {_value_} as string)[])))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> source1
source1 stringify(column1 = adf.prospect.{@status} ? string,
	format: 'json') ~> Stringify1
